title: rest in piece pay the bills
body:
here lies one of the greatest to have ever lived, we pray today that his soul reach heaven and be delivered from riot game

could have flown with the best of them, you will be missed

replies.body: Yeah...this behavior is a big no-no. Locking this discussion as well as removing said player from the Boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Pay The Bills,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gWExf4J9,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-05T20:43:46.004+0000)
>
> could have flown with the best of them, you will be missed

Could have, but you chose to rage in chat and call people %%% instead so here we are.
You realize hes an arbitor right.
i want to realize who the fucking retard who hired a filthy mexican is

Naw, is this a joke ?   No one can say that slap-in-the-face crap and Not understand that their account was going to get shit-canned, Right??

P.S. Rest in Peace :)

The chatlogs clearly show this account  _"took its own life" _ .
I don't know why someone would do this after they've spent this much time though...

the only thing the chat logs show is that you're not part of the 0.006%

sucker
